attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible.
attributes.review: i was reading these reviews and the app already seemed awful, but i wanted to check it out for myself. This app is a disgusting excuse for an app. and to add to that, trump is a white suprematist, i mean a terrible president and only wants america to be how he wants it. this app is bad. 0/10

attributes.title: Awful!!

attributes.title: Terrible,
attributes.review:
There is terrible customer service and there are no games to play on it.  There are no songs to stream on it and the people it mentions are not my type.  I hope they fix the bugs and glitches.
-Karen
